extractedCUECs.text: User entity should implement procedures to ensure that access to the system is restricted to authorized users and that access rights are reviewed on a periodic basis.
User entity should establish procedures to ensure that data backups are performed regularly and that backup data can be restored in a timely manner.
extractedCUECs.comment: Maps directly to our quarterly backup verification process

extractedCUECs.text: User entity should implement change management procedures to ensure that changes to the system are authorized, tested, and documented.
User entity should establish incident response procedures to address security incidents in a timely manner.
User entity should implement monitoring procedures to detect unauthorized access attempts and system anomalies.
User entity should ensure that sensitive data is encrypted both in transit and at rest using industry-standard encryption methods.
